{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Best Data |model=WL400 |revision=-RAP |upc=757448002478 |asin=B0000633E7 |est_release_date=03/14/2002 |fcc_date=05/08/2001 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf= |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model=DR-E200W |manuf_rev=JR |availability=EoL |type=wireless router |fcc_id=M4Y-XI-300 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510B |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XI-300 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861B |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6050 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=10M |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:60:B3 |oui_eth=00:30:AB }} {{TagLine|Smart One Wireless Router}} :10Mbit WAN, 10/100 LAN (Switched)
This router is likely to be very similar to: *[[IBM High Rate Wireless LAN Gateway (DR-E200W)]] *[[Compaq iPAQ Connection Point CP-2W]] *[[Netgear MR314]].
